page.title: 01A TYPICAL FARM IN THE AREA
page.content: MR.AND MRS. MASSEY OWN A FARM IN THE BOYLESTONE AREA.WE WENT ON A VISIT TO THEIR FARM AND TOOK A QUESTIONAIRE. HERE IS A PART OF THE INFORMATION THAT WE COLLECTED ABOUT THEIR FARM. THE BUILDINGS ARE OWNED BY THE MASSEYS BUT THE LAND IS OWNED BY THE SUDBURY ESTATE AND IN PART BY THE NATIONAL TRUST. THE FARM'S MAIN BUILDINGS ARE THREE VERY LARGE BARNS AND ADDITIONAL CYLINDRICAL STRUCTURES ALL OF WHICH ARE USED FOR STORAGE.IN ADDITION THERE IS THE HOUSE AND TWO MACHINE SHEDS.HERE IS A LIST OF THE MACHINES OWNED BY THE MASSEY'S.1 COMBINE HARVESTER.4 TRACTORS.1 SEED DISTRIBUTER.1 PLOUGH.1 SORTER.ASSORTED TRAILERS. MOST OF THE FIELDS ARE LARGE,AND IN SOME INSTANCES THIS HAS BEEN
